page.title: 20TRAFFIC THROUGH OGBOURNE
page.content: The{A345}is a trunk road; that is, the speed limit is 60mph and when it goes through a village it is 30mph.In this area it links Swindon with Marlborough and passes very close to Ogbourne St Andrew, though not right through the centre of the village. We conducted a survey of the traffic going along this road, in both directions.The survey was carried out between 1.30 and 2.30pm on a Tuesday. We found that the vast majority of the vehicles travelling on the A345 were cars, and many more cars were coming into Marlborough than going out at this time of day.We were surprised to find that only 14% of the cars were registered in Wiltshire; that is probably because the Berks.,Oxon.and Gloucestershire borders are quite near.We also found that fewer lorries use this road than the A4.
